name: @darlean/examples
description: Examples of using Darlean Virtual Actor Technology

scripts.example:oracle: npm run example:simple_oracle && npm run example:oracle_with_service && npm run example:oracle_with_service:clientserver && npm run example:oracle_with_service:clientserver2
scripts.example:oracle_with_service:clientserver: concurrently "npm run example:oracle_with_service:server server server" "npm run example:oracle_with_service:client client server"

concurrently "npm run example:oracle_with_service:server server01 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle_with_service:server server02 server01,server02" "npm run example:oracle_with_service:client client server01,server02"
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
